themes: integration of arts training with leadership and career development
mentorship between local artists and students
funding and technical assistance for small, community-based organizations
key_phrases: combine artistic training with leadership and career development
mentorship opportunities connecting local artists with students
funding and technical assistance tailored to small, community-based organizations
brings arts directly into underserved communities
barriers_identified: lack of mentorship opportunities for students
insufficient funding and technical assistance for small, community-based organizations
limited access to arts programming in underserved communities
solutions_proposed: offer programs that support youth-centered arts education
combine artistic training with leadership and career development
create mentorship opportunities connecting local artists with students
provide funding and technical assistance tailored to small, community-based organizations
support mobile or neighborhood-based programming that brings arts directly into underserved communities
